page.title: 10FARMING(cont)
page.content: On the lower slopes of the hills,fruit is grown above the frost hollow.The growing of highly perishable soft fruit benefits from the proximity of the motorway(M5)which opens up easy access to the main markets,although much is still sold locally. Harder foresting is evident on the steeper slopes and remnants of the oak forests which once covered the area are still visible.Interspersed between wooded slopes and the lower grazing areas are large numbers of{bee-hives} which allows for a thriving local industry.
